data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moulet, Pierre (2017): Updated catalogue of Iranian Anthocoridae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Cimicomorpha). Zootaxa 4311 (4): 451-479, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4311.4.1|17 occurrences
